it.unibz.pomodroid
Class Pomodoro

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      it.unibz.pomodroid.SharedActivity
          it.unibz.pomodroid.Pomodoro

public class Pomodoro
extends SharedActivity

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
See Also:
This class implements graphically the pomodoro technique. Here we have the counter and the description of the activity to face.
